alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:00PM CDT until July 21 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LEE...SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD...EASTERN ST. FRANCIS...EASTERN POINSETT...SOUTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI...CRITTENDEN AND EASTERN CROSS COUNTIES... At 1259 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jonesboro to 6 miles north of Parkin to near Hughes, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, West Memphis, Marion, Trumann, Marked Tree, Earle, Lake City, Lepanto, Bay, Hughes, Caraway, Parkin, Tyronza, Keiser, Joiner, Crawfordsville, Edmondson, Dyess, Horseshoe Lake and Sunset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
